wikipedia_page.main: Lara Prior-Palmer (born 24 June 1994) is an athlete and writer. She is the niece of British equestrian Lucinda Green.

response: Green married Australian equestrian David Green in 1981 in Salisbury and they have a son Freddie (born May 1985) and daughter Lissa (born February 1989), who is an international event rider. The couple divorced in 1992. Her niece is Lara Prior-Palmer, the first woman to win the Mongol Derby.
*2020 Lara Prior-Palmer, Rough Magic: Riding the World's Wildest Horse Race
* Lara Prior-Palmer (born 1994), British writer and athlete
